snippet: The military contractor formerly known as Blackwater Worldwide has agreed to pay a $7.5 million fine to settle charges of arms-sales violations, the Justice Department said.
abstract: Academi LLC, military contractor formerly known as Blackwater Worldwide and later Xe Services LLC, agrees to pay a $7.5 million fine to settle charges of arms-sales violations.
lead_paragraph: The military contractor formerly known as Blackwater Worldwide has agreed to pay a $7.5 million fine to settle charges of arms-sales violations, the Justice Department said.

headline.main: Blackwater Successor to Pay Fine to Settle Arms Charges
headline.print_headline: Blackwater Successor to Pay Fine to Settle Arms Charges
